name: Die2Day
description:
It's a game about a suicide. A man is jumping from a bridge. You control him. He can swim. He wants to die, so you have to steer him to hit a ship. Try to die as many times as you can in 30 seconds!

CONTROL: Mouse click/space to jump, mouse to move player around during the jump.

Made for Crazy Weekend Jam 5a - reverse.

Update: added animation for hitting water, better music

Theme: Joke. And reverse edition.
